titleStmt.title: The principles of holy Christian religion, or, The catechism of the Church of England paraphrazed for the use of Borwick-Hall.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, R. (Richard), 1612-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes and are to be sold by R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Sherlock by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
